**Government Tender Announcement - Expert Analysis on Canadian and Global Life Sciences Sector**

**Reference Number:** cb-627-39361750

**Tender Closing Date:** July 17, 2024, 14:00:00 EST

**Amendment Date:** July 17, 2024

**Expected Contract Start Date:** September 1, 2024

**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2027

**Tender Status:** Expired

**Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to participants from countries participating in the following free trade agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA).

**Region of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Region of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity:**

Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada

235 Queen Street
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0H5 Canada

**Contact Information:** Davis Opie, davis.opie@ised-isde.gc.ca (613) 324-9165

**Summary:**

Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) seeks the services of a contractor to carry out expert analysis on the Canadian and global life sciences sector. The analysis will support the Department's mandate of strengthening the domestic life sciences ecosystem and advancing Medical Countermeasures (MCM) preparedness. The expertise required includes in-depth economic analysis on sector trends and developments, analytics related to corporate performance, expert analysis of complex manufacturing supply chains and production practices, both in Canada and abroad.

**Tender Documents:**

The tender documents are posted on Canada.ca. Interested participants are required to submit their proposals by the tender closing date.
